headline: Pennsylvania American Water Files Rate Request Driven by More Than $1.2 Billion in Ongoing Investment to Provide Safe, Clean, Reliable Service
summary: MECHANICSBURG, Pa., November 14, 2025--Pennsylvania American Water today filed a request with the Pennsylvania Public Utility Commission (PUC) for new rates to support $1.2 billion in ongoing water and wastewater service system investments. The request reinforces the company’s commitment to implementing critical system upgrades and continuing to improve water quality and reliability for its more than 2.4 million people served statewide.
